me aanduwa apahasuthawayata path karanna mewa karanne.ithin aanduwa kiyatawath apahasuthawayata path wenne naha.api sadakalikawa inna awillawath naha.api inna ehema balaporoththuwak naha.punchi daruwakuge oluwata helmat ekak dana kota daruwa balanawa mokada me mage oluwata helmat ekak danne kiyala.eeye pereda fes buk eke thibuna kalthota diyawinna paththe kattiyak kambiyak dige gaga tharanaya karanawa .api palam hatharak dala thiyenawa mewa ithin api kata kiyannada mokatada me widihata deshapalanaya karanne .deshapalanaya oluwe thiya gena wada karanna hoda naha .asathya prakasha digin digatama kara gena yanawa.me rajaya aawa gaman haduwe madhya nidahasayi.wadiyenma wiwechanayata lak wenne janadhipathithuma agamathithuma amathya mandalaye apiyi.api oonama dekata sudanam wela wada karana ayayi.api me katayuthu karanne me rate anagathaya gana hithalayi.api loku sabhyathwayak gana katha karanawa.ithihasayak gana katha karanawa.sinhala bauddha kam gana katha karanawa.lagama pasala hodama pasala wyapruthiye pradhana aramuna pasalwala me anawashya thadabadaya nawathwanna.api ape wagakima hariyakarawa itu karanawa api mewa karanne obe heta dawasa wenuwen bawa da amathyawariya wadiduratath sandahan kalaya.
